verses.verse: Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5020><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%>, unto all <S%H3606><s%> people <S%H5972><s%>, nations <S%H524><s%>, and languages <S%H3961><s%>, that dwell <S%H1753><s%> <S%H8748><s%> in all <S%H3606><s%> the earth <S%H772><s%>; Peace <S%H8001><s%> be multiplied <S%H7680><s%> <S%H8748><s%> unto you.

I thought <S%H6925><s%> it good <S%H8232><s%> <S%H8754><s%> to shew <S%H2324><s%> <S%H8682><s%> the signs <S%H852><s%> and wonders <S%H8540><s%> that the high <S%H5943><s%> 'Elohim <S%H426><s%> hath wrought <S%H5648><s%> <S%H8754><s%> toward <S%H5974><s%> me.

How <S%H4101><s%> great <S%H7260><s%> are his signs <S%H852><s%> ! and how <S%H4101><s%> mighty <S%H8624><s%> are his wonders <S%H8540><s%> ! his kingdom <S%H4437><s%> is an everlasting <S%H5957><s%> kingdom <S%H4437><s%>, and his dominion <S%H7985><s%> is from <S%H5974><s%> generation <S%H1859><s%> to generation <S%H1859><s%>.
I <S%H576><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5020><s%> was <S%H1934><s%> <S%H8754><s%> at rest <S%H7954><s%> <S%H8752><s%> in mine house <S%H1005><s%>, and flourishing <S%H7487><s%> in my palace <S%H1965><s%>:

I saw <S%H2370><s%> <S%H8754><s%> a dream <S%H2493><s%> which made me afraid <S%H1763><s%> <S%H8741><s%>, and the thoughts <S%H2031><s%> upon <S%H5922><s%> my bed <S%H4903><s%> and the visions <S%H2376><s%> of my head <S%H7217><s%> troubled <S%H927><s%> <S%H8792><s%> me.

Therefore <S%H4481><s%> made <S%H7761><s%> <S%H8752><s%> I <S%H4481><s%> a decree <S%H2942><s%> to bring <S%H5954><s%> <S%H8682><s%> in all <S%H3606><s%> the wise <S%H2445><s%> men of Babylon <S%H895><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> me, that they might make known <S%H3046><s%> <S%H8681><s%> unto me the interpretation <S%H6591><s%> of the dream <S%H2493><s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> came <S%H5954><s%> <S%H8750><s%> in the magicians <S%H2749><s%>, the astrologers <S%H826><s%>, the Chaldeans <S%H3779><s%>, and the soothsayers <S%H1505><s%> <S%H8750><s%>: and I <S%H576><s%> told <S%H560><s%> <S%H8750><s%> the dream <S%H2493><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> them; but they did not <S%H3809><s%> make known <S%H3046><s%> <S%H8683><s%> unto me the interpretation <S%H6591><s%> thereof.

But at <S%H5705><s%> the last <S%H318><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> came in <S%H5922><s%> before me <S%H6925><s%>, whose name <S%H8036><s%> was Belteshazzar <S%H1096><s%>, according to the name <S%H8036><s%> of my god <S%H426><s%>, and in whom is the spirit <S%H7308><s%> of the holy <S%H6922><s%> 'elohim <S%H426><s%>: and before <S%H6925><s%> him I told <S%H560><s%> <S%H8754><s%> the dream <S%H2493><s%>, saying,

O Belteshazzar <S%H1096><s%>, master <S%H7229><s%> of the magicians <S%H2749><s%>, because I <S%H576><s%> know <S%H3046><s%> <S%H8754><s%> that the spirit <S%H7308><s%> of the holy <S%H6922><s%> 'elohim <S%H426><s%> is in thee, and no <S%H3606><s%> <S%H3809><s%> secret <S%H7328><s%> troubleth <S%H598><s%> <S%H8750><s%> thee, tell <S%H560><s%> <S%H8747><s%> me the visions <S%H2376><s%> of my dream <S%H2493><s%> that I have seen <S%H2370><s%> <S%H8754><s%>, and the interpretation <S%H6591><s%> thereof.

Thus were the visions <S%H2376><s%> of mine head <S%H7217><s%> in <S%H5922><s%> my bed <S%H4903><s%>; I saw <S%H1934><s%> <S%H8754><s%> <S%H2370><s%> <S%H8751><s%>, and behold <S%H431><s%> a tree <S%H363><s%> in the midst <S%H1459><s%> of the earth <S%H772><s%>, and the height <S%H7314><s%> thereof was great <S%H7690><s%>.

The tree <S%H363><s%> grew <S%H7236><s%> <S%H8754><s%>, and was strong <S%H8631><s%> <S%H8754><s%>, and the height <S%H7314><s%> thereof reached <S%H4291><s%> <S%H8748><s%> unto heaven <S%H8065><s%>, and the sight <S%H2379><s%> thereof to the end <S%H5491><s%> of all <S%H3606><s%> the earth <S%H772><s%>:

The leaves <S%H6074><s%> thereof were fair <S%H8209><s%>, and the fruit <S%H4><s%> thereof much <S%H7690><s%>, and in it was meat <S%H4203><s%> for all <S%H3606><s%>: the beasts <S%H2423><s%> of the field <S%H1251><s%> had shadow <S%H2927><s%> <S%H8681><s%> under <S%H8460><s%> it, and the fowls <S%H6853><s%> of the heaven <S%H8065><s%> dwelt <S%H1753><s%> <S%H8748><s%> in the boughs <S%H6056><s%> thereof, and all <S%H3606><s%> flesh <S%H1321><s%> was fed <S%H2110><s%> <S%H8729><s%> of it <S%H4481><s%>.

I saw <S%H1934><s%> <S%H8754><s%> <S%H2370><s%> <S%H8751><s%> in the visions <S%H2376><s%> of my head <S%H7217><s%> upon <S%H5922><s%> my bed <S%H4903><s%>, and, behold <S%H431><s%>, a watcher <S%H5894><s%> and an holy one <S%H6922><s%> came down <S%H5182><s%> <S%H8750><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> heaven <S%H8065><s%>;

He cried <S%H7123><s%> <S%H8751><s%> aloud <S%H2429><s%>, and said <S%H560><s%> <S%H8750><s%> thus <S%H3652><s%>, Hew down <S%H1414><s%> the tree <S%H363><s%>, and cut off <S%H7113><s%> <S%H8745><s%> his branches <S%H6056><s%>, shake off <S%H5426><s%> <S%H8680><s%> his leaves <S%H6074><s%>, and scatter <S%H921><s%> <S%H8745><s%> his fruit <S%H4><s%>: let the beasts <S%H2423><s%> get away <S%H5111><s%> <S%H8748><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> under it <S%H8479><s%>, and the fowls <S%H6853><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> his branches <S%H6056><s%>:

Nevertheless <S%H1297><s%> leave <S%H7662><s%> <S%H8747><s%> the stump <S%H6136><s%> of his roots <S%H8330><s%> in the earth <S%H772><s%>, even with a band <S%H613><s%> of iron <S%H6523><s%> and brass <S%H5174><s%>, in the tender grass <S%H1883><s%> of the field <S%H1251><s%>; and let it be wet <S%H6647><s%> <S%H8721><s%> with the dew <S%H2920><s%> of heaven <S%H8065><s%>, and let his portion <S%H2508><s%> be with <S%H5974><s%> the beasts <S%H2423><s%> in the grass <S%H6211><s%> of the earth <S%H772><s%>:

Let his heart <S%H3825><s%> be changed <S%H8133><s%> <S%H8741><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> man's <S%H606><s%>, and let a beast's <S%H2423><s%> heart <S%H3825><s%> be given <S%H3052><s%> <S%H8725><s%> unto him; and let seven <S%H7655><s%> times <S%H5732><s%> pass <S%H2499><s%> over <S%H5922><s%> him.

This matter <S%H6600><s%> is by the decree <S%H1510><s%> of the watchers <S%H5894><s%>, and the demand <S%H7595><s%> by the word <S%H3983><s%> of HaKadoshs <S%H6922><s%>: to <S%H5705><s%> the intent <S%H1701><s%> that the living <S%H2417><s%> may know <S%H3046><s%> <S%H8748><s%> that Ha `Elyon <S%H5943><s%> ruleth <S%H7990><s%> in the kingdom <S%H4437><s%> of men <S%H606><s%>, and giveth <S%H5415><s%> <S%H8748><s%> it to whomsoever <S%H4479><s%> he will <S%H6634><s%> <S%H8748><s%>, and setteth up <S%H6966><s%> <S%H8681><s%> over <S%H5922><s%> it the basest <S%H8215><s%> of men <S%H606><s%>.

This <S%H1836><s%> dream <S%H2493><s%> I <S%H576><s%> king <S%H4430><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5020><s%> have seen <S%H2370><s%> <S%H8754><s%>. Now thou <S%H607><s%>, O Belteshazzar <S%H1096><s%>, declare <S%H560><s%> <S%H8747><s%> the interpretation <S%H6591><s%> thereof, forasmuch as <S%H6903><s%> all <S%H3606><s%> the wise <S%H2445><s%> men of my kingdom <S%H4437><s%> are not <S%H3809><s%> able <S%H3202><s%> <S%H8750><s%> to make known <S%H3046><s%> <S%H8682><s%> unto me the interpretation <S%H6591><s%>: but thou <S%H607><s%> art able <S%H3546><s%> <S%H8751><s%>; for the spirit <S%H7308><s%> of the holy <S%H6922><s%> 'elohim <S%H426><s%> is in thee.

Then <S%H116><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%>, whose name <S%H8036><s%> was Belteshazzar <S%H1096><s%>, was astonied <S%H8075><s%> <S%H8733><s%> for one <S%H2298><s%> hour <S%H8160><s%>, and his thoughts <S%H7476><s%> troubled <S%H927><s%> <S%H8792><s%> him. The king <S%H4430><s%> spake <S%H6032><s%> <S%H8750><s%>, and said <S%H560><s%> <S%H8750><s%>, Belteshazzar <S%H1096><s%>, let not <S%H409><s%> the dream <S%H2493><s%>, or the interpretation <S%H6591><s%> thereof, trouble <S%H927><s%> <S%H8792><s%> thee. Belteshazzar <S%H1096><s%> answered <S%H6032><s%> <S%H8750><s%> and said <S%H560><s%> <S%H8750><s%>, My lord <S%H4756><s%>, the dream <S%H2493><s%> be to them that hate <S%H8131><s%> <S%H8750><s%> thee, and the interpretation <S%H6591><s%> thereof to thine enemies <S%H6146><s%>.

The tree <S%H363><s%> that thou sawest <S%H2370><s%> <S%H8754><s%>, which grew <S%H7236><s%> <S%H8754><s%>, and was strong <S%H8631><s%> <S%H8754><s%>, whose height <S%H7314><s%> reached <S%H4291><s%> <S%H8748><s%> unto the heaven <S%H8065><s%>, and the sight <S%H2379><s%> thereof to all <S%H3606><s%> the earth <S%H772><s%>;

Whose leaves <S%H6074><s%> were fair <S%H8209><s%>, and the fruit <S%H4><s%> thereof much <S%H7690><s%>, and in it was meat <S%H4203><s%> for all <S%H3606><s%>; under <S%H8460><s%> which the beasts <S%H2423><s%> of the field <S%H1251><s%> dwelt <S%H1753><s%> <S%H8748><s%>, and upon whose branches <S%H6056><s%> the fowls <S%H6853><s%> of the heaven <S%H8065><s%> had their habitation <S%H7932><s%> <S%H8748><s%>:

It is thou <S%H607><s%>, O king <S%H4430><s%>, that art grown <S%H7236><s%> <S%H8754><s%> and become strong <S%H8631><s%> <S%H8748><s%>: for thy greatness <S%H7238><s%> is grown <S%H7236><s%> <S%H8754><s%>, and reacheth <S%H4291><s%> <S%H8754><s%> unto heaven <S%H8065><s%>, and thy dominion <S%H7985><s%> to the end <S%H5491><s%> of the earth <S%H772><s%>.

And whereas the king <S%H4430><s%> saw <S%H2370><s%> <S%H8754><s%> a watcher <S%H5894><s%> and an holy one <S%H6922><s%> coming down <S%H5182><s%> <S%H8750><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> heaven <S%H8065><s%>, and saying <S%H560><s%> <S%H8750><s%>, Hew <S%H1414><s%> the tree <S%H363><s%> down <S%H1414><s%>, and destroy <S%H2255><s%> <S%H8740><s%> it; yet <S%H1297><s%> leave <S%H7662><s%> <S%H8747><s%> the stump <S%H6136><s%> of the roots <S%H8330><s%> thereof in the earth <S%H772><s%>, even with a band <S%H613><s%> of iron <S%H6523><s%> and brass <S%H5174><s%>, in the tender grass <S%H1883><s%> of the field <S%H1251><s%>; and let it be wet <S%H6647><s%> <S%H8721><s%> with the dew <S%H2920><s%> of heaven <S%H8065><s%>, and let his portion <S%H2508><s%> be with <S%H5974><s%> the beasts <S%H2423><s%> of the field <S%H1251><s%>, till <S%H5705><s%> seven <S%H7655><s%> times <S%H5732><s%> pass <S%H2499><s%> over <S%H5922><s%> him;

This <S%H1836><s%> is the interpretation <S%H6591><s%>, O king <S%H4430><s%>, and this <S%H1932><s%> is the decree <S%H1510><s%> of Ha `Elyon <S%H5943><s%>, which is come <S%H4291><s%> <S%H8754><s%> upon <S%H5922><s%> my lord <S%H4756><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%>:

That they shall drive <S%H2957><s%> <S%H8751><s%> thee from <S%H4481><s%> men <S%H606><s%>, and thy dwelling <S%H4070><s%> shall be <S%H1934><s%> <S%H8748><s%> with <S%H5974><s%> the beasts <S%H2423><s%> of the field <S%H1251><s%>, and they shall make thee to eat <S%H2939><s%> <S%H8748><s%> grass <S%H6211><s%> as oxen <S%H8450><s%>, and they shall wet <S%H6647><s%> <S%H8743><s%> thee with the dew <S%H2920><s%> of heaven <S%H8065><s%>, and seven <S%H7655><s%> times <S%H5732><s%> shall pass <S%H2499><s%> over <S%H5922><s%> thee, till <S%H5705><s%> thou know <S%H3046><s%> <S%H8748><s%> that Ha `Elyon <S%H5943><s%> ruleth <S%H7990><s%> in the kingdom <S%H4437><s%> of men <S%H606><s%>, and giveth <S%H5415><s%> <S%H8748><s%> it to whomsoever <S%H4479><s%> he will <S%H6634><s%> <S%H8748><s%>.

And whereas they commanded <S%H560><s%> <S%H8754><s%> to leave <S%H7662><s%> <S%H8749><s%> the stump <S%H6136><s%> of the tree <S%H363><s%> roots <S%H8330><s%>; thy kingdom <S%H4437><s%> shall be sure <S%H7011><s%> unto thee, after <S%H4481><s%> that thou shalt have known <S%H3046><s%> <S%H8748><s%> that the heavens <S%H8065><s%> do rule <S%H7990><s%>.

Wherefore <S%H3861><s%>, O king <S%H4430><s%>, let my counsel <S%H4431><s%> be acceptable <S%H8232><s%> <S%H8748><s%> unto thee <S%H5922><s%>, and break off <S%H6562><s%> <S%H8747><s%> thy sins <S%H2408><s%> by righteousness <S%H6665><s%>, and thine iniquities <S%H5758><s%> by shewing mercy <S%H2604><s%> <S%H8749><s%> to the poor <S%H6033><s%> <S%H8750><s%>; if <S%H2006><s%> it may be <S%H1934><s%> <S%H8748><s%> a lengthening <S%H754><s%> of thy tranquillity <S%H7963><s%>.
All <S%H3606><s%> this came <S%H4291><s%> <S%H8754><s%> upon <S%H5922><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5020><s%>.

At the end <S%H7118><s%> of twelve <S%H8648><s%> <S%H6236><s%> months <S%H3393><s%> he walked <S%H1934><s%> <S%H8754><s%> <S%H1981><s%> <S%H8750><s%> in <S%H5922><s%> the palace <S%H1965><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4437><s%> of Babylon <S%H895><s%>.

The king <S%H4430><s%> spake <S%H6032><s%> <S%H8750><s%>, and said <S%H560><s%> <S%H8750><s%>, Is not <S%H3809><s%> this <S%H1932><s%> <S%H1668><s%> great <S%H7229><s%> Babylon <S%H895><s%>, that I <S%H576><s%> have built <S%H1124><s%> <S%H8754><s%> for the house <S%H1005><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4437><s%> by the might <S%H8632><s%> of my power <S%H2632><s%>, and for the honour <S%H3367><s%> of my majesty <S%H1923><s%> ?

While <S%H5751><s%> the word <S%H4406><s%> was in the king's <S%H4430><s%> mouth <S%H6433><s%>, there fell <S%H5308><s%> <S%H8754><s%> a voice <S%H7032><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> heaven <S%H8065><s%>, saying, O king <S%H4430><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5020><s%>, to thee it is spoken <S%H560><s%> <S%H8750><s%>; The kingdom <S%H4437><s%> is departed <S%H5709><s%> <S%H8754><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> thee.

And they shall drive <S%H2957><s%> <S%H8751><s%> thee from <S%H4481><s%> men <S%H606><s%>, and thy dwelling <S%H4070><s%> shall be with <S%H5974><s%> the beasts <S%H2423><s%> of the field <S%H1251><s%>: they shall make thee to eat <S%H2939><s%> <S%H8748><s%> grass <S%H6211><s%> as oxen <S%H8450><s%>, and seven <S%H7655><s%> times <S%H5732><s%> shall pass <S%H2499><s%> over <S%H5922><s%> thee, until <S%H5705><s%> thou know <S%H3046><s%> <S%H8748><s%> that Ha `Elyon <S%H5943><s%> ruleth <S%H7990><s%> in the kingdom <S%H4437><s%> of men <S%H606><s%>, and giveth <S%H5415><s%> <S%H8748><s%> it to whomsoever <S%H4479><s%> he will <S%H6634><s%> <S%H8748><s%>.

The same hour <S%H8160><s%> was the thing <S%H4406><s%> fulfilled <S%H5487><s%> <S%H8754><s%> upon <S%H5922><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5020><s%>: and he was driven <S%H2957><s%> <S%H8752><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> men <S%H606><s%>, and did eat <S%H399><s%> <S%H8748><s%> grass <S%H6211><s%> as oxen <S%H8450><s%>, and his body <S%H1655><s%> was wet <S%H6647><s%> <S%H8721><s%> with the dew <S%H2920><s%> of heaven <S%H8065><s%>, till <S%H5705><s%> his hairs <S%H8177><s%> were grown <S%H7236><s%> <S%H8754><s%> like eagles <S%H5403><s%> ' feathers, and his nails <S%H2953><s%> like birds <S%H6853><s%> ' cTorahs.
